title: Meditation: Awakening Loving Presence (2021-12-22)
itunes:title: Meditation: Awakening Loving Presence
description: Meditation: Awakening Loving Presence (2021-12-22) - Loving presence is an innate capacity, and it can be cultivated. This meditation begins with a scan arousing a relaxed tender presence in the body, then brings loving attention to our inner life, and in widening circles, to our world.
